title: Iraqi Crisis Brings Focus On Indian Migrants Who Seek Profit Amid Peril
teaser: When the northern Iraqi city of Mosul was captured by Sunni militants, 40 Indian construction workers were taken hostage. It's one of the first diplomatic challenges for the new government in India, which sees millions of migrant workers move abroad and send some $70 billion back home to family.
